description: Number of planar 2-trees with n nodes.
comments: Table 2 of Palmer and Read paper gives incorrect value a(10) = 457025. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 12 2016
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: E. M. Palmer and R. C. Read, On the number of plane 2-trees, J. Lond. Math. Soc., 6 (1973), 583-592.
Index entries for sequences related to trees
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: a(10) corrected and more terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 12 2016
